Articles.Content: I'm looking for cockpits that look like the kind you would find on a world war 2 plane. the two mods i've found were both hosted on kerbal stuff and therefor are close to impossible to find, if anyone else knows of another mod i would love to hear. thanks!
Firespitter has a B17 cockpit.  Lack's Stock Extensions has a glazed bomber cockpit and a WW2 fighter cockpit.

Add one of those long tail pieces things onto a Mk1 cockpit and maybe some fuel tanks or crew cabins and merge it down with a larger part like half way and WA LA! Instant B-17! You can thank me later. 

 

This is a Spacecraft sandbox simulator...

Though a B-17 in space would be cool...

The current Mk1 inline cockpit is pretty good for fighters like the JUG!!! And with a few parts pretty good Corsair cockpit...

Oh and for P-38 best fighter ww2

Look at my thread where i'm recreating various aircrafts from WWII era and little beyond:

I've used following mods for the cockpits:

SXT (Junkers Ju87, Avro Lancaster)

Firespitter (B-17, PZL P11c)

Coffee Industries A6M Zero cockpit (A6M Zero, F4F-3 Wildcat)

Retro Future (Corsair)

Generic Inline Cockpit (FW190 Wurger, Dora, Ta-152)

Quiz Tech Aero (Vampire, Venom, Panther)
Bit of necroposting, but screw it. The SXT cockpit that looks like a Ju-87 is only available in 0.625m, so getting wings onto it without tweakscale is very hard.
